r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with Redis
r.d: This extension provides an API for communicating with Redis servers.
r.n:
phpredis 5.2.1
This is a bugfix release that fixes `redis->zAdd` arginfo as well as a segfault when closing persistent connections.
* Fix arginfo for Redis::zadd [a8e2b021] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko) * Fix segfault on closing persistent stream [b7f9df75] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko)
* Sponsors ~ Audiomack.com - https://audiomack.com ~ Till Kruss - https://github.com/tillkruss
